overview:
Jae Song is Co-founder & CTO of Vidquik, and the person who developed and coded the initial platform. He’s a multi-disciplined engineer with a broad range of experiences in hardware and software. Jae’s specialties are in Java programming, C, C++, PHP, MySQL, multimedia, video editing and photo editing. Jae is certified in numerous areas such as being a Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP), Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA), Check Point Security Certification, Windows Server Certification, and several others.

Jae graduated from Stevens Institute of Technology, which is the nation’s third Top Patent-Revenue-Generating University, with a BS in Computer Science. He has lectured in computer science at Bloomfield College in Bloomfield, New Jersey.
